#summary Instructions for building JebGL from the source code.
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Building JebGL =
== Get the source ==
Get the latest code
{{{
svn checkout http://jebgl.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ jebgl-read-only
}}}
or a release (e.g. 0.1)
{{{
svn checkout http://jebgl.googlecode.com/svn/releases/0.1/ jebgl-read-only
}}}

== Get necessary JOGL jars ==
Put them in a directory called webstart inside your newly created jebgl directory

== Build ==
Open a terminal and call
{{{
make
}}}
in the jebgl directory. This should build a jar file called `jebgl.jar`
